description.displayText: Anyone lucky enough to find Giorgi available for care giving should hire him immediately. Over 3+ years, Giorgi filled the final years of my father's life with humor, grace, and intelligence. In the process he became very close with many members of our family and is will remain a dear friend for life. He is a gem of a caregiver with real gift for bringing joy to his work and to your home. If you find Giorgi available to help you, consider yourself lucky. Opportunities like this don't happen every day. Please reach out for more information at anytime.

description.displayText: Giorgi has been a god send the last few months. My father was diagnosed with dementia and started having violent tantrums during his confused states, especially after Covid complications. Giorgi was not deterred, quite the opposite. He was patient and compassionate with my father, and his memory care and physical therapy background, helped my father reestablish a routine and in the process gave my family, especially my worried mother, some peace and security. Definitely someone you don't want to pass up the opportunity to work with :)

description.displayText: My sister and I hired Georgi to help care for our father. I appreciated his professional demeanor and passion for his work. He went above and beyond to take care of Dad. It was clear he knew his stuff regarding safe transfers, mobility, aspiration precautions. He also helped with cooking meals, cleaning and he even helped fix one of the brakes on our Dad's walker. Would definitely hire again!

description.displayText: Giorgi started as a caregiver for my Mom (94) and Dad (91) in June. He has been with us nearly 4 month and has been very dependable and is so caring with both Dad who has dementia and Mom. He is knowledgeable handling older people and very thoughtful and compassionate.
